item.title: Delivery
item.description: SSCIL simplify your delivery and logistics services with a comprehensive solution including 24/7 self vegicle transportation for delivery cables, LED lights, accessories to our agents and customers in all over Bangladesh.

item.title: Management
item.description: SSCIL management structured in a way based on its objectives. Our organisation is efficient, flexible, innovative and caring in order to achieve a sustainable competitive advantage.

item.title: 1. Electronics & Communication
item.description: Rafsan Group has important role in Electronics & Communication sector in Bangladesh. We are a Cable manufacturer, retailer, supplier, distributor of CAT5/5E, CAT6/6E, Coaxial Cable 100% Copper, CSS etc.

item.title: 2. Apparel & Textile
item.description: Rafsan Group has important role in apparel and textile sector in Bangladesh. We are a apparel manufacturer, supplier, sourcing agency of raw materials, dyes, chemicals and other trimmings.

item.title: 3. Printing & Packaging
item.description: Rafsan Group has important role in Printing & Packaging sector in Bangladesh. We are a packaging material manufacturer and a wide range of printing facilities.

item.title: 4. Sourcing & Trading
item.description: Rafsan Group has important role in Sourcing & Trading in Bangladesh. We are a Sourcing & Trading Agent, supplier of raw materials, dyes, chemicals, accessories and trimmings.

item.title: 5. Logistics & Delivery
item.description: Rafsan Group has important role in Logistics & Delivery Services in Bangladesh. We are providing trasportation, global shipping, carrier, container, vehicles, truck etc.

item.title: 6. Charity Organization
item.description: Saleha Jahid Charity Organization Our Charity Organization located in Magura District, is helping rootless childs educations, foods, shelter and proper care.
